reviews.review: Good game.
Мне эта игра очень понравилась)

Стоит ли покупать эту игру? Безусловно стоит!
Итак начнем с плюсов:
-Отличная графика и детализация
-Научно-фантастический сеттинг
-Юмор ( В некоторых моментах  я смеялся до слез )
-Сюжет ( Местами его конечно легко угадать, но все же он хорош )
Теперь перейдем к минусам:
-Немного сложная ( Скорее всего потому что я тупой :D )
-Очень короткая :с
Итог: Игра получилась просто изумительной. Она обладает хорошим геймплеем, юмором и не побоюсь этого слова душой. Уверяю ни один твой шекель не будет потрачен зря.
P.S: Я плакал в конце :с

Hola, este juego es muy bueno, os lo recomiendo 100%, si os gusta esto de pasar niveles i los juegos de plataformas, este juego es para vosotros.

I played this game on PS3 with a friend a couple years ago. When I saw it on sale, I HAD to buy it, and get my girlfriend to buy a copy too.

You heard me right, she has a copy too. I googled "games to play with your girlfriend", and of the several lists that came up, this game was on all of them. And I can say, every one of them is right.

AWESOME GAME TO PLAY WITH YOUR GIRLFRIEND.

Ok, quick sum up why. (Co-op mode)
Its a puzzle game that relies on teamwork. Some timed puzzles are tricky, but not too difficult after a few tries. Mostly its a "go at your own pace" kinda game. Most importantly, death has no real penalty, save starting back at the spawn point (which may prove a pain in later levels).

Anyway, if you like a cooperative puzzle game, with a unique portal element, this is for you.

But don't sell the single player game short. Haven't played it much, but in its own right its good too. Also, let me point out that the single player game is different from the co-op game, so you essentially get two campaigns in one.

嗨呀！为什么我过了5年多才接触这部神作啊，真是相见恨晚！在以fps为主的v社游戏中，传送门系列真是让人眼前一亮。解谜类游戏的难度不好把握，有的太过简单，有的又让人完全摸不着头脑，但是传送门系列难度恰到好处，大多数关卡是可以经过长时间的思考攻略的，因为这个游戏需要考虑的要素无非就那几个，位置，重力，弹跳，加速，顺序，场景道具等，就这些简单的东西排列组合就可以玩出许多花样，每次思考然后顿悟的过程让人自豪感爆棚，这种感觉是一般的打怪升级换装备的游戏无法带给我们的。希望G胖早点学会数3！！！
Absolutely love it, the humor, the puzzles, the beautifull game. 10/10

So Valve and their designers worked to recapture the elements that were used to create the masterpiece "Portal". They did these same elements, improved them, added new ones, got great characters, and an excellent story with twists and suprises. This game is the perfect sequel and I throughly enjoyed every second of it. The challenge and story progresses as you do. It evolves and unfolds around you. Throw a great climax and finish. Great gameplay and excellent soundtrack! I couldn't say more good things about this game, well I could, but my hands would bleed from typing so much. It's that great. "Portal" and it's sequel "Portal 2" are masterpieces. So if we take the numbers from each game.. 1 and 2. 1+2= 3. PORTAL 3 CONFIRMED?!?! I sincerely hope. This game was amazing, couldn't go wrong with it.

Portal 2 is NOT like Portal. You see when I first played Portal I got like 1:30 hours of play time. Then you go to Portal 2 and you think its like the last game with the same 1:30 hours of playtime but then you get sucked in for at least another 7 hours or at least I did. Its great because you meet the same robot you "killed" and loved along with a new friend named Wheatley. The puzzles are so challenging you actually sit there thinking " How should I approach this?". Which is great beause they cranked up the difficulty to what I was looking for. So difficult that your brain starts thinking but not so aggravating that you decide to quit the game and never touch it again.  Portal 2 is the sibling to the original or Portal 2.0 the improved addition. To me Portal is the game to introduce you to the topic and Portal 2 is the game to remind you of the mechanics while introducing new ones  and test your knowledge of the game.  I haven't even talked about the Cooperative part of the game which I haven't even touched myself but I bet it's so great that I'll add another 8 hours into the game.( I need a friend who actually wants to play with me ). Portal 2 is one of those revolutionary ideas that I wished people still kept thinking of instead of remakes/remasters for older games to leech off nostalgia geeks. I highly recommend playing this game if you want a challenging puzzle game.
